name: R5-ChargeItem-R4-ChargeItem
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ChargeItem into FHIR R4

element.display: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products

target.display: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem` is narrower than R4 `ChargeItem` and is compatible. `ChargeItem` is mapped from `ChargeItem` and `ChargeItem.totalPriceComponent`.
R5 `ChargeItem.account` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.account`
R5 `ChargeItem.bodysite` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.bodysite`

element.display: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code

target.display: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.code`
R5 `ChargeItem.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.contained`

element.display: Organization that has ownership of the (potential, future) revenue

target.display: Organization that has ownership of the (potential, future) revenue
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.costCenter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.costCenter`

element.display: Resource defining the code of this ChargeItem

target.display: Resource defining the code of this ChargeItem
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.definitionCanonical`

element.display: Defining information about the code of this charge item

target.display: Defining information about the code of this charge item
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.definitionUri` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.definitionUri`

R5 `ChargeItem.encounter` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.context` - context has change due to type change: R5 `encounter` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `context`

element.display: Date the charge item was entered

target.display: Date the charge item was entered
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.enteredDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.enteredDate`
R5 `ChargeItem.enterer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.enterer`

R5 `ChargeItem.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `ChargeItem.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.id`
R5 `ChargeItem.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.implicitRules`

R5 `ChargeItem.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `ChargeItem.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.meta`

R5 `ChargeItem.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `ChargeItem.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: When the charged service was applied

target.display: When the charged service was applied
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.occurrence[x]`

element.display: Reason for overriding the list price/factor

target.display: Reason for overriding the list price/factor
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.overrideReason` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `ChargeItem.overrideReason` - overrideReason removed a binding requirement - Example ; overrideReason has change due to type change: R5 overrideReason CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 overrideReason
R5 `ChargeItem.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.partOf`
R5 `ChargeItem.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.performer`

R5 `ChargeItem.performer.actor` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.performer.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R5 `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `actor`

R5 `ChargeItem.performer.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.performer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: What type of performance was done

target.display: What type of performance was done
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.performer.function` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.performer.function`
R5 `ChargeItem.performer.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.performer.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.performer.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.performer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `ChargeItem.performingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.performingOrganization`

R5 `ChargeItem.product` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.product[x]` - product[x] changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); product[x] has change due to type change: R5 product CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 product[x]

element.display: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced

target.display: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.quantity`

element.display: Why was the charged  service rendered?

target.display: Why was the charged  service rendered?
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.reason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.reason`
R5 `ChargeItem.requestingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.requestingOrganization`

element.display: Which rendered service is being charged?

target.display: Which rendered service is being charged?
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.service` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ChargeItem.service` - service has change due to type change: R5 service CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 service

element.display: planned | billable | not-billable | aborted | billed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: planned | billable | not-billable | aborted | billed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/chargeitem-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/chargeitem-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `ChargeItem.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.subject`
R5 `ChargeItem.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ChargeItem.text`

target.display: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products
target.comment: R5 `ChargeItem.totalPriceComponent` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `ChargeItem` - ChargeItem changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); ChargeItem has change due to type change: R5 type MonetaryComponent does not exist in R4

element.display: Unit price overriding the associated rules
